None.Name: Shadow Affinity
None.Description: Active to decompose those have an affinity towards Shadow: every own unit endowed with a Shadow affinity will immediately return 50% of the usual power refund into the actual power pool upon dying.Lasts for 20s or crystal is destroyed.
